You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there. In a statement the Prime Minister said: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my Director of Communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government.
